name: The Thorn Tower
description:
Let me tell you a short little tale.

Of thorns and beautiful spite.

One rainy day a fox prince discovered a tower covered in thorns.

His fate is up to you, keeping his currant relationship strong or falling into the sick curse of the tower and its sole resident.

This game features 6 different ending.

WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAIN VIOLENT CONTENT AND DISTURBING THEMES

16+ for violence and gore

Audio and Music by Eric Matyas
